timeline.body: Should we also have a `validate()` method inside `VersioningConfiguration` and call it from here? The `status` field validation can be done in it.
timeline.bodyText: Should we also have a validate() method inside VersioningConfiguration and call it from here? The status field validation can be done in it.
timeline.bodyHTML: Should we also have a validate() method inside VersioningConfiguration and call it from here? The status field validation can be done in it.
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: VersioningConfiguration has the check in the constructor. I do not think we need to validate status field here because of it.
replies.author: balamurugana

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
Boolean flag = (mfaDelete != null) ? Boolean.valueOf("Enabled".equals(mfaDelete)) : null;
return flag;
return Boolean.valueOf("Enabled".equals(mfaDelete));
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: No. We need to return three possible values. None, Boolean.FALSE or Boolean.TRUE.
replies.author: balamurugana

timeline.bodyHTML:
Can we use switch statement here?
Or maybe we can just use the toString() method and make this a single statement.

Suggested change
if (config.status() == VersioningConfiguration.Status.OFF) {
System.out.println("Versioning on bucket 'my-bucketname' is not enabled");
} else if (config.status() == VersioningConfiguration.Status.ENABLED) {
System.out.println("Versioning on bucket 'my-bucketname' is enabled");
} else if (config.status() == VersioningConfiguration.Status.SUSPENDED) {
System.out.println("Versioning on bucket 'my-bucketname' is suspended");
}
String statusStr = config.status().toString();
System.out.println("Versioning on bucket 'my-bucketname' is " + statusStr.isEmpty ? "Off" : statusStr);
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: Simplified to just print the status.
replies.author: balamurugana
